lead_paragraph: New Orleans Hornets guard Jannero Pargo signed a one-year deal with Dynamo Moscow of the Russian League, his agent, Mark Bartelstein, said. The one-year deal is worth nearly $4 million, about twice what Pargo made for the Hornets last year, Bartelstein said. The 6-foot-1, 175-pound Pargo averaged 8.1 points in 18.7 minutes as a reserve last season.
